sub_title: Inventory Associate | MSc in International Supply Chain  Management
summary:
I am a recent Master graduate in Supply Chain management with hands-on experience in operations, inventory management, logistics planning and administration work. 
I found myself as a self-motivated person with strong sense of responsibility and can-do attitude. I am also a pragmatic problem solver with ability to handle multiple priorities in fast-paced environment. I am dedicated, willing to learn through doing and share my drive to succeed. 
I like teamwork and I believe that working with others is not only a chance to grow ourselves, but if we are willing to go the extra miles, we could assist each other to go toward a common goal.
I am currently looking for an opportunity to develop my career in a global environment.

education.field_of_study: Logistics, Materials, and Supply Chain Management
Banking, Corporate, Finance, and Securities Law

certifications.name: Import Export Professional
certifications.authority: Center of Economic Development of Ho Chi Minh City

projects.title: International Project
projects.description:
My team consists of 6 members from three majors: Supply chain management, Finance and Accounting, and Consultancy and Entrepreneurship. Our mission is to advise HIIT Club on a marketing plan and cost structure optimization
	Doing market research on fitness industry in Sao Paulo City and recommending a marketing plan focusing on new customer acquisition 
	Analyzing company cost structure and suggesting initiatives to increase cost productivity (focusing on purchasing strategy)

contributors.headline: Inventory Associate | MSc in International Supply Chain  Management

company.name: HIIT Club – a Health and Fitness Business

profile_positions.company: HIIT Club – a Health and Fitness Business
profile_positions.description:
	Analyze operation cost and propose a cost-allocation plan that reduces unnecessary cost and optimize profit margin
	Analyze supply market of fitness equipment in Sao Paulo, and propose purchasing strategies for new equipment and necessaries for fitness operation
	Execute market research, establish forecasting model to support Demand & Supply Plans for new branch opening in June 2019, and propose initiatives to optimize cost and maximize profit
profile_positions.title: Operations Management Consultant

profile_positions.description:
	Take ownership in inventory control, transfer, and allocation; trouble-shoot related problems from order entry to delivery, resolve exceptions and execute necessary adjustments
	Monitor flow of goods through organization’s network, maximize product availability and sufficient lead time 
	Coordinate with supply and demand planners, procurement, and production to execute business target and maintain service level
	Review and conduct analysis on inventory movement; identify and resolve supply risks with cross-functional teams
	Monitor approved Purchase Orders in terms of inventory, order fulfillment and on time delivery; proactively inform customers timely if there is product shortages and follow-up the cases
	Assist in identifying inventory availability and/or reallocation plans to support promotions and business plans
	Conduct analysis on inventory availability and timely delivery performance; identify and analyze root cause
	Take on process improvement initiatives and assess Key Performance Indicators (KPI) that focus on inventory planning and supply chain efficiency and desired service levels: lead time, allocation, warehouses, logistics, distribution, operations, etc.
profile_positions.title: Inventory Assistant

company.name: MSIG Asia - a leading general insurance brand in Asia with great reputation for marine cargo

profile_positions.description:
	Maintain and develop relationship with existing clients, prepare renewal contracts and adjustments in necessary
	Prepare proposal; negotiate contract terms and ensure the agreements are reasonable and commercially advantageous
	Check on shipping documents and ensure all papers comply with Laws and Regulations then issue insurance policy  
	Collaborate with Cross-functional team on demand trends and establish execution plan to optimize service level
	Handle all clients’ queries and complaint; ensure good client relationship and maximize client satisfaction 
	Assess performance metrics of logistics companies based on loss ratio and suggest alternative premium rate if necessary    
	Analyze sales performance, compare actual sale vs projection; identify variance and prepare reports 
	Assess KPIs and take on initiatives to improve sales performance and achieve target on sales volume and client satisfaction
profile_positions.title: Sales Support in Logistics
